title: Azure ETL Developer/Data Engineer (100% Remote)
full_description: Our direct client is looking to hire a 100% Remote Senior ETL Developer to join their team on a full-time/direct-hire basis.MUST have exp with Azure*Only US Citizen and Green Card candidates will be considered*Under moderate supervision and guidance, the ETL Developer will provide data analysis, data modeling and data orchestration both on premise and in the Azure cloud.  ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIESApply solid design principals to create data flows, scheduling, mapping, and structuring of data for consumption.Execute data analysis to understand source and target systems.Execute multiple, concurrent projects in an agile environment.Analyze and identifies cloud architecture strategy and service deployment.Test, tune and support data pipelines and structures.Implement required data security.Maintain a data dictionary.Assist with ML and AI model deployment to the cloud.MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS6+ years working in ELT, ETL and data orchestration in an
